name: Gasteroids (PardinuX)
description:
Gas! Gas! Gas!

Pick up Gasteroids in order to get highest score possible!

The more difficult you play, the more points you'll get for each asteroid.

Use your mouse or touchpad to move the Drone! Use your finger on android.

During the game you can play 'P' to pause the game.

Easy and enjoyable.

Have fun!
